meanings.definition: A small breed of dog, typically with a wiry coat and a feisty temperament.
meanings.sent1: My neighbor's terrier loves to chase squirrels in the park.
meanings.sent2: The terrier barked loudly at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent3: The terrier thought it was the boss of the house, always demanding treats.
meanings.sent4: Her terrier spirit never backed down from a challenge, just like its namesake breed.
meanings.sent5: The terrier's wiry coat felt rough to the touch, matching its energetic personality.

meanings.definition: A person who is tenacious or aggressive in pursuit of their goals.
meanings.sent1: As a terrier in negotiations, she never gave up until she got what she wanted.
meanings.sent2: The young entrepreneur was a real terrier, always pushing boundaries to succeed.
meanings.sent3: He was a terrier when it came to finding the best deals, never settling for less.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of a terrier, fiercely holding onto her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The terrier in her personality made her unstoppable in achieving her ambitions.
